The Russian BMP-3 tried to attack the Avdiivsky direction, but the 47 brigades from the first shot were burned. A unique video where the hostile "box" on the move crashes a projectile from the American Pau Paladin.

The new tactics of Russian - in the south they brought their "Red Army" to the forest.

In the Avdeevsky direction, the occupiers began to use ground robotic platforms with automatic grenade launcher. There are currently two of them, after which they were destroyed by the pilots of drones of 47 brigades.

In the Donetsk region, the drones of the 24th OMB named after King Daniel carry a shelter in which the occupiers were settled.

Three of the evil people planned to get to Hungary illegally - they paid almost $ 22,000 and got into the hands of Ukrainian border guards.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergei Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: American SAU destroys the Russian BMP on the move, drones destroy robot
